title: Drawing, "Cows in  pasture", ca. 1855–60
medium: Brush and black and brown wash, graphite on white wove paper
markings: Marks: "Damask Linene" and hand holding a rose
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Four cows (one on the ground, one facing the viewer and two grazing) in a grassy pasture with trees on either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cows in  pasture", ca. 1855–60.
ca. 1855–60. Brush and black and brown wash, graphite on white wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-52.
